item.description:

Report an error. Prince Edward–Hastings MP Daryl Kramp was in Bancroft to take part in the grand re-opening of the Bancroft Railway Station. Alongside the many community leaders, volunteers and invited public, Kramp took time to celebrate what has been ...

item.title: Mentioned by Napanee Guide
item.description:
Federal grant boosts park revitalization
MP Daryl Kramp was in the park last Tuesday with town staff and volunteers to announce the $80,000 grant, which is part of the federal government's Infrastructure Improvement Fund, brings the project's funds up to $148,000 to date — ever closer to the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Minister Goodyear Visits Belleville to Discuss Future Plans for Jobs, Growth and ...
BELLEVILLE, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - July 24, 2013) - The Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario) along with Daryl Kramp, Member of Parliament for Prince Edward-Hastings, made a number of stops ... "I'm pleased to be here in Belleville with my colleague MP Kramp and to participate in these roundtable discussions to make certain we continue to create programs that help the businesses and workers in this community.".

item.title: Mentioned by Quinte News
item.description:
Gary Goodyear visits Quinte
Gary Goodyear started his tour of the region, by making an appearance on the Lorne Brooker Show, with Prince Edward-Hastings MP Daryl Kramp. Kramp says job creation is a key focus for the government and that's part of why Minister Goodyear is visiting ...
